Articles.Content:
How do I find a map sector and assign it to my Nav ball?  I'm just starting out with this game on the xbox one, and started career mode working on the first contract.

Thanks

Map sector? I don't think there is such a thing in KSP. So I'm going to guess at the answer to your question.

Sometimes you get contracts that ask you to fly to a particular place. Once you are sitting in your plane, you can go into map mode, then zoom in and click on the contract destination point. That will put a marker on your navball.

If you want to put your own markers on the map at places of your choosing, you have to wait until you have upgraded the Astronaut Complex and Tracking Station to Tier 2. At that point you can plant flags, and select them as "Targets". (Instead of planting a flag, you can leave a piece of debris at the map point, and target that instead.)

However, the first two contracts are always to take one science reading -- and then to get a rocket a few inches off the ground. -- Unless you wait too long to visit Mission Control and those contracts expire.
